locale.title: 007: Blood Stone
locale.synopsis: James Bond 007: Blood Stone features the likeness and voice talent of Daniel Craig, Joss Stone and Judi Dench and features an epic, original story developed by legendary screenwriter Bruce Feirstein. Players can engage in cover-based firefights, lethal hand-to-hand combat and speed their way through explosive adrenaline-fueled driving sequences as they embark on a global chase leading to action on land and sea through Athens, Istanbul, Monaco and Bangkok.

locale.title: 007: Blood Stone
locale.synopsis: Une conspiration internationale a placé le projet biochimique le plus secret du Royaume-Uni entre des mains mortelles, et seul l'agent le plus meurtrier de Sa Majesté, James Bond, peut percer le mystère. Embarquez pour une course mondiale qui vous mènera à des combats sur terre, sur mer et dans les airs à travers Athènes, Istanbul, Monaco et Bangkok.

locale.title: 007: Blood Stone
locale.synopsis: An international conspiracy has placed the UK's most secretive biochemical project into deadly hands, and only Her Majesty’s most lethal agent, James Bond, can unravel the mystery. Embark on a global chase that will have you battling on land, sea, and air through Athens, Istanbul, Monaco, and Bangkok.

locale.title: GoldenEye 007
locale.synopsis: The GoldenEye story comes to life once again with an updated single player storyline featuring Daniel Craig as Bond and wrltten by Bruce Feirstein, the screenwriterfor the original movie. Surprise enemies covertly or engage in a full on firefight and use Bond's latest gadget to uncover intel an augmented reality as you relive all the classic GoldenEye movie moments. lnfiltrate the dam and destroy the facility; chase Ourumov in the tank through the streets of St. Petersburgh and investigate the secret jungle base.

After being banned to the Underworld, these Earthbound Immortals will stop at nothing to overthrow the rule of New Domino City and destroy Satellite. To defeat them, players will enlist the help of some of their favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! universe! Compete in story mode or free duel mode against Jack, Yusei or any of the 20 new characters to take on the Dark Signers in an epic battle to settle the score between light and dark!

locale.synopsis:
The Winx girls are here to have some fun !
Design an outfit from head to toe or edit an outfit from any of the Winx girl's wardrobes, then make your favourite Winx a model to show off your creation on the catwalk. Get to know all the Winx girls, when their birthdays are, what their favourite colour is etc., find out which one you're most like with their personality tests and play each of their themed games. Never miss a date with an in-depth diary & reminder system, save personal data and friends' info, create lists and contact friends via wifi voice chat. Includes plenty of pictures, videos and music from the TV series plus much, much more...

locale.title: Jam with the Band
locale.synopsis:
If you're a music lover then the unique new game Jam with the Band will help transform your Nintendo DS into a fun, portable music maker allowing you to get creative with your friends.
Program your own version of famous songs and share them with other players. Or jam to a collection of popular songs from a constantly expanding song list. If you're after a unique gameplay experience then be sure to turn up the volume and Jam with the Band!

locale.title: Blue Dragon: Awakened Shadow
locale.synopsis: Aus einem langen Schlaf erwacht, haben die neuen Feinde eine gewisse Ähnlichkeit mit Nene, dem besiegten Gegner des ersten Spiels, einem Rätsel, das den Spieler Shu und seine Freunde in einen schrecklichen Kampf führt, um die verlorenen Schatten zurückzugewinnen und das Gleichgewicht in der Welt wiederherzustellen .

locale.title: Blue Dragon: Awakened Shadow
locale.synopsis: Après le réveil d'un long sommeil, un ennemi ayant une certaine ressemblance avec Nene (le méchant du premier jeu) est une énigme qui entraîne le joueur, Shu et ses amis dans une aventure palpitante pour récupérer les ombres perdues et rétablir l'équilibre dans le monde.

locale.title: Blue Dragon: Awakened Shadow
locale.synopsis: Dopo essersi risvegliati da un lungo sonno, un nemico con una certa somiglianza con Nene (il cattivo del primo gioco) costituisce un enigma che trascina il giocatore, Shu e i suoi amici in un'avventura emozionante per recuperare le ombre perdute e ristabilire l'equilibrio nel mondo.

locale.title: Blue Dragon: Awakened Shadow
locale.synopsis: Awakened from a long slumber, the new enemies bear some resemblance to Nene, the defeated adversary of the first game, a conundrum which leads the player, Shu, and his friends into a terrifying fight to reclaim the lost shadows and restore balance to the world.

locale.title: Blue Dragon: Awakened Shadow
locale.synopsis: Tras despertar de un largo letargo, un enemigo con cierto parecido a Nene (el villano del primer juego) supone un enigma que lleva al jugador, Shu y sus amigos a una trepidante aventura para recuperar las sombras perdidas y reestablecer el equilibrio en el mundo.

locale.title: Inazuma Eleven
locale.synopsis: Mark Evans ist der Kapitän der Fußballmannschaft von Raimon Jr. High und möchte unbedingt die Trophäe des Football Frontier-Turniers gewinnen. Da gibt es nur ein Problem. Er hat keine elf Spieler beisammen. Und die, die er hat, sind nicht gerade die motiviertesten Jungs. Aber jetzt es gibt einen neuen Jungen in der Stadt namens Axel Blaze, der offenbar ein ganz fantastischer Stürmer ist. Wenn Mark ihn für die Mannschaft gewinnen könnte, hätten sie vielleicht eine Chance.

locale.title: Inazuma Eleven
locale.synopsis: Mark Evans est le capitaine de l'équipe de football du lycée Raimon Jr High et il veut vraiment gagner le trophée du tournoi Football Frontier mais il y a un problème. Il lui faut onze joueurs et ceux dont il dispose ne sont pas les plus motivés. Axel Blaze et le nouveau, il vient d'arriver et on dit de lui que c'est un attaquant hors pair. Si Mark parvient à lui faire rejoindre l'équipe, ils pourront peut-être gagner.

locale.title: Inazuma Eleven
locale.synopsis: Mark Evans, il capitano della squadra di calcio Raimon Jr High, desidera ardentemente vincere il torneo Football Frontier, ma c'è un problema: la sua squadra non ha 11 giocatori e, anche quelli che ci sono, non si può dire che siano particolarmente motivati. Ma è arrivato un ragazzo in città, Axel Blaze, e pare che sia un ottimo attaccante. Se Mark riesce a farlo entrare in squadra, forse i suoi sogni di gloria non resteranno solo sogni.

locale.title: Inazuma Eleven
locale.synopsis: Mark Evans is the captain of the Raimon Jr High football team and really wants to win the Football Frontier tournament trophy, but there’s a problem. He hasn't got eleven players and the ones he does have aren't the most motivated bunch of lads. There’s a new kid in town called Axel Blaze and who's apparently an amazing striker. If Mark can get him in the team, they might have a shot at winning.

locale.title: Inazuma Eleven
locale.synopsis: Mark Evans es el capitán del equipo de fútbol del instituto Raimon y quiere ganar a toda costa la copa del torneo Football Frontier. El problema es que aún no cuenta con once jugadores, y los que tiene, bueno, no son los tíos más motivados del mundo. Eso sí, hay un chico nuevo en la escuela, de nombre Axel Blaze, del que se dice que es un gran delantero. Si Mark consiguiera que se una al equipo, quizás estaría más cerca de lograr su sueño.

locale.title: Pokémon Version Blanche
locale.synopsis: La région d'Unys vous attend. Votre mission : tous les attraper et devenir le meilleur Dresseur de Pokémon ! Avec plus de 150 nouveaux Pokémon, des saisons qui changent et de nouvelles connectivités, Pokémon Version Blanche vous lance un défi de taille !

locale.title: Pokémon Version Noire 2
locale.synopsis: Embarquez-vous dans une nouvelle aventure dans la région d'Unys sur Nintendo DS.

locale.title: Pokémon Versione Nera 2
locale.synopsis: Un allenatore di Alisopoli deve fronteggiare nuovi capipalestra nella regione di Unima, drasticamente mutata e ricoperta di ghiaccio. Il gioco segna il ritorno del Team Plasma, di N e di Ghecis. Quest'ultimo vuole utilizzare il potere del Pokémon leggendario Kyurem a scopi malefici.

locale.title: Pocket Monsters Black 2
locale.synopsis: Embark on a new Pokémon adventure in the Unova region, on Nintendo DS.

locale.title: Pokémon Edición Negra 2
locale.synopsis: ¡Emprende una nueva aventura Pokémon para salvar la región de Teselia! Te esperan nuevos desafíos y actividades. Un científico misterioso… ¡Una nueva historia!

locale.title: Solatorobo: Red the Hunter
locale.synopsis: Enter a world of epic fantasy action in this high octane RPG brought to life by beautiful graphics created by internationally renowned designers

locale.title: Fossil Fighters Champions
locale.synopsis: In this dino-tastic sequel, players get some hands-on time to hunt and clean fossils, and revive and battle Vivosaurs. A fossil park is hosting a large-scale tournament in which competitors enter Vivosaurs created from dinosaur fossils into competition.

locale.title: FIFA Soccer 11
locale.synopsis: FIFA 11 reinvents player authenticity - on and off the ball - for every player and at every position on the pitch with Personality+, an all-new feature that sees individual abilities reflected in game, enabling clear differentiation for every player.

locale.title: FIFA 11
locale.synopsis: Cram a whole world of football in your pocket and experience the highs, lows and never-ending drama of the beautiful game on the move in FIFA 11 for Nintendo DS. Choose from over 500 clubs from 30 pro leagues and take your team to the top.

game.name: Pokémon Conquest (Europe) (EN)

locale.title: Pokémon Conquest
locale.synopsis: Pokémon Conquest on Nintendo DS offers a fun new way to play Pokémon in a unique world called Ransei, that's filled with adventure!

game.developer: The Pokémon Company/TECMO KOEI GAMES Co., Ltd.

locale.title: Nintendo DSi Browser
locale.synopsis: This version of the popular Opera browser is made specifically for Nintendo DSi systems, and uses both screens of the Nintendo DSi and its Touch Screen technology to offer a comfortable, speedy and straightforward surfing experience. You can navigate web pages with your stylus and enter text whenever the need arises by using the on-screen keyboard or built-in handwriting recognition.

locale.title: Real Soccer 2010
locale.synopsis: Real Soccer, the #1 soccer game on Nintendo DSiWare, is back for the most exciting season yet! Choose from even more teams: over 245 clubs in 8 leagues and almost all players. Plus 3 new stadiums: Bavaria, République and Catedral. Perform flip-flaps, stepovers, etc. with the convenient touchscreen controls. TV commentary adds to the realism. Take photos to customize the ball, flag or even players and challenge friends wirelessly to tournaments.

locale.title: Real Football 2010
locale.synopsis: Real Football - the number one football game on Nintendo DSiWare - is back for the most exciting season yet! Choose from even more teams with over 245 clubs in eight leagues and nearly every player, plus three new stadiums: Bavaria, Republic and Cathedral. Perform flip flaps, step overs and more with effortless Touch Screen controls. The TV commentary adds to the realism. Take pictures to customise your ball, flag or even players, then challenge friends in tournaments for maximum fun.

locale.title: Metal Torrent
locale.synopsis:
Prepare for a high level of intensity as you pilot a solo ship deep into enemy space in this vertically scrolling shooter. Battle wave after wave of relentless attackers aiming to do one thing—destroy you! Your goal, beyond mere survival, is simple: get the highest score possible and earn bragging rights in online leaderboards.
Two powerful fighters are at your disposal: the Accipiter and Bateleur, tailored for beginner or expert players. Progress through eight phases of action and take out enemies by tactically using your weapons: an unlimited-fire blaster weapon available to both ships and an energy-consuming special weapon unique to each craft. Absorb energy cubes from destroyed enemies to replenish your energy gauge and increase your score. Collect a series of consecutive cubes to create a chain and boost your score even higher!
Choose from pattern or random modes to vary the level of challenge, but the real indication of skill comes from competing with players around the world for the highest score possible. Use Nintendo wifi Connection to upload your score to the online leaderboards to see where you stack up or even view replays of top-ranking players’ games and study their secrets. Do you have what it takes to be the best?

locale.title: Zombie Blaster
locale.synopsis: Fight off hordes of the undead as they seek out the living in Zombie Blaster. Struggle for survival as infected, snarling zombies try to turn you into a mindless decaying corpse with a hunger for human flesh. Armed with deadly weapons, you must fight your way through the living dead or find yourself walking among them.

locale.title: Bomberman Blitz
locale.synopsis: Bomberman makes his debut downloadable appearance on Nintendo DSiWare™ with Bomberman Blitz! Experience the classic Bomberman multiplayer experience with 8 player local and online multiplayer through Nintendo® wifi Connection. Hone your skills and learn the maps and when ready, take the battle online! Change multiple map and item preferences for tons of customization options to battle it out. Delivering unparalleled multiplayer gaming excitement, Bomberman Blitz gives everyone who picks up the Nintendo DSi system the addictive fun of Bomberman, anytime, anywhere! Bring friends!

locale.title: Bomberman Blitz
locale.synopsis:
With 10 million copies sold, the "Bomberman" series is the definitive party game, great for a quick battle anywhere, anytime.
Single Player: Hone your skills against CPU players.
Multiplayer: Play wirelessly with other players who have the game. (Up to 8 players.)
This game includes 10 Battle Game stages from "BOMBERMAN 2".

game.name: Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Minis March Again! (Europe) (EN,FR,DE,ES,IT)

locale.title: Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Minis March Again!
locale.synopsis:
The re-opening of Mario’s theme park, Super Mini Mario World, was going so well... until Donkey Kong burst in and kidnapped the hapless Pauline once again! So it’s up to you and the Mini Marios – tiny mechanical Mario toys – to rescue Pauline from that crazed ape’s clutches.
Instead of controlling the Mini Marios directly, you use the stylus to manipulate objects in each trap-laden level, and lead the fragile toys safely to the exit. Once you clear all eight levels on a floor, you’ll get a chance to pummel Donkey Kong with your Mini Mario-launching cannon!
Another feature is the Construction Zone, which allows you to create your own original levels, play levels that you or others have made, and share or download levels via local wireless communications.

locale.title: Mario vs. Donkey Kong : le retour des Mini!
Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Die Rückkehr der Mini-Marios!
Mario vs. Donkey Kong: ¡Los Minis marchan de nuevo!
Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Minimario alla riscossa
Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Minis March Again!
Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Minis March Again!

locale.title: Downtown Texas Hold'em
locale.synopsis: For the first time on DSi, go all-in with EA’s Downtown Texas Hold ‘Em!Sharpen ‘n show off your poker skills in 2 exciting game modes and take on up to 20 players in authentic showdowns. Put on your best poker face and challenge friends to a Multiplayer match. Start with a practice game, play a round of classic poker, then jump into turbo tournament to win the grand prize! Buy your way into gambling halls & casinos, each with its own unique background with realistic tables, cards & chips!

locale.title: DOWNTOWN TEXAS HOLD 'EM
locale.synopsis: For the first time on DSi, go all-in with EA’s Downtown Texas Hold ‘Em!Sharpen ‘n show off your poker skills in 2 exciting game modes and take on up to 20 players in authentic showdowns. Put on your best poker face and challenge friends to a Multiplayer match. Start with a practice game, play a round of classic poker, then jump into turbo tournament to win the grand prize! Buy your way into gambling halls & casinos, each with its own unique background with realistic tables, cards & chips!

locale.title: Flipnote Studio
locale.synopsis:
Jot down your thoughts for the day or let your imagination run riot with a free Nintendo DSiWare application that lets you get creative on the go.
Flipnote Studio acts both as an electronic notepad and a pocket-sized animation studio with which you can conjure your own animated “Flipnotes” before sharing them with your friends – or the rest of the world.
If you simply want to write yourself a reminder note or record a vocal memo, the unique features of Nintendo DSi make it easy to do so via the Touch Screen and system microphone. With every Flipnote you create stored within an easy-to-access calendar, you’ll be able to keep track of your thoughts, ideas or tasks for the day wherever you are.
But that’s not the whole picture! As every Flipnote you make can consist of multiple pages, Flipnote Studio places the power to create your own unique animations in your hands. Using a versatile range of tools on the Touch Screen, you’ll be able to let your imagination run riot before sharing your creations and viewing the work of others through the Flipnote Hatena website.

locale.title: Cámara Glamour
locale.synopsis: ¡Pásalo en grande haciendo fotos y dándole rienda suelta a tu imaginación con Cámara Glamour!. Ponte a sacar fotos con las cámaras de tu Nintendo DSi y, a continuación, decora tus instantáneas con todo tipo de marcos, fondos, sellos y divertidos accesorios de moda… ¡o utiliza los distintos útiles de pintura para retocar tus fotos con todo lujo de detalles!. También podrás cambiar los ajustes de fotografía (como las condiciones de luz y el tipo de lente) para adaptarlos a lo que quieras retratar, o incluso utilizar el temporizador para salir tú también en la foto. Cuando hayas terminado, no olvides guardar tus imágenes favoritas en el álbum de la Cámara Nintendo DSi para compartirlas por medio de la comunicación inalámbrica… ¡o hasta subirlas a Facebook!. Textos de pantalla en español. Cámara Glamour es un juego lifestyle para todas las edades desarrollado por la propia Nintendo, su fecha de lanzamiento fue el 25 de diciembre y su coste 500 puntos DSi.

locale.title: Sparkle Snapshots
locale.synopsis: Have fun taking photos and letting your imagination run wild with Sparkle Snapshots! Snap photos with the cameras on your Nintendo DSi, then decorate your snapshots with all kinds of frames, backgrounds, stamps and fun fashion accessories – or use the various painting tools to touch up your photos in exquisite detail! You can also change the photo settings (such as lighting conditions and lens type) to suit your image, or even use the timer to get yourself in the picture too. When you’re done, don’t forget to save your favourite images to the Nintendo DSi Camera album to share via wireless communication – or even upload to Facebook!

locale.title: Need for Speed Nitro-X
locale.synopsis: Get in gear for the super-charged thrill of driving the world’s hottest cars and the flat-out fun of arcade-style racing! Access awesome custom features like the Camera Tag Editor: snap images with the camera and plaster racing environments with your personal tag. Touch controls give you the feel of real racing as you push it to the limit in up to 18 supercars. Set your siren off in the exclusive Super Pursuit Mode that lets you drive as a Cop!

locale.title: Need for Speed Nitro-X
locale.synopsis: Get in gear for the super-charged thrill of driving the world’s hottest cars and the flat-out fun of arcade-style racing! Access awesome custom features like the Camera Tag Editor: snap images with the camera and plaster racing environments with your personal tag. Touch controls give you the feel of real racing as you push it to the limit in up to 18 supercars. Set your siren off in the exclusive Super Pursuit Mode that lets you drive as a Cop!

locale.title: Pop Island: Paperfield
locale.synopsis: Thanks to the easy pick-up-and-play controls, you can dive into the fresh universe of Pop Island - Paperfield and have fun in almost no time! Join your team and race, surf or fly on three new islands. Get a maximum of flags to win the victory in the “Race for flags” or “Capture the flag” mode. FURIOUS MACHINE With the new “Magic Shooters” team, take control of eight land, sea and air vehicles or animals, including tanks, hovercrafts, planes, surfing penguins, eagles and black cats! 1-8 PLAYERS In Solo Mode, rack up points and unlock new playable vehicles and maps. Thanks to the DS Download Play feature, share Pop Island - Paperfield and compete with up to seven friends! Plus, If you own the original Pop Island, you can get three new maps and four vehicles including the helicopter and the submarine! Please note that elements of this software may have been featured in previously released software.

locale.title: Pop Island Paperfield
locale.synopsis: Thanks to the easy pick-up-and-play controls, you can dive into the fresh universe of Pop Island - Paperfield and have fun in almost no time! Join your team and race, surf or fly on three new islands. Get a maximum of flags to win the victory in the “Race for flags” or “Capture the flag” mode. locale.title: Tetris Party Live
locale.synopsis:
Tetris Party Live features several exciting game modes from the popular Tetris Party series, including Marathon (a favorite single-player mode), Computer Battle (challenge the computer), VS Battle (challenge a friend) and Duel Space (strategize to claim more space than an opponent).
But the party doesn’t stop there: Take the Tetris fun online via the Nintendo® wifi Connection service (broadband Internet access required) and enjoy multiplayer Tetris with up to three opponents at a time. You can also use the global ranking system to see how your Tetris Party Live skills stack up against the rest of the world.

locale.title: Tetris Party Live
locale.synopsis:
Tetris Party Live features several exciting game modes from the popular Tetris Party series, including Marathon (a favorite single-player mode), Computer Battle (challenge the computer), VS Battle (challenge a friend) and Duel Space (strategize to claim more space than an opponent).
But the party doesn’t stop there: Take the Tetris fun online via the Nintendo® wifi Connection service (broadband Internet access required) and enjoy multiplayer Tetris with up to three opponents at a time. You can also use the global ranking system to see how your Tetris Party Live skills stack up against the rest of the world.

locale.title: Ante Up: Texas Hold'em
locale.synopsis:
While poker has always been a part of Western culture, the ease and accessibility of Texas Hold’em has brought the game to the masses, whether on TV or in casinos. Ante Up: Texas Hold’em makes poker fun portable with realistic mechanics and a compelling story to keep you stimulated and playing for hours. The game is graphically superb, and the players are realistic portrayals of uncanny casino characters.
Choices include an undercover vice cop who practices what he patrols and an aspiring actress with a daring streak. You’ll find 12 characters in all. Best of all, the game is based on the authenticity of poker and the algorithms that produce a natural falling of the cards. You’ll swear you’re in Vegas as you face the pressure of making a call or daring a bluff while your money sweats it out on the table.

locale.title: UNO
locale.synopsis:
UNO is a classic card game for everyone! No matter your age or experience with card games, you’ll pick up the rules in a flash. Then it’s every man for himself – UNO is an easy game to play, but not such an easy game to win!
With UNO on WiiWare and Nintendo DSiWare, there are all sorts of fun modes to try whether you’re playing by yourself or with friends and family. You can play a normal game of UNO in Free Play, take on tricky challenges in Tournament Mode or get together with other gamers for a shared experience in Multiplayer Mode!
The controls are simple and intuitive, whether it’s the WiiWare or Nintendo DSiWare version you’re playing. Use the Wii Remote to select your card on the screen with WiiWare and the stylus if you’re playing on the Touch Screen with your Nintendo DSi!
Once you’ve got the controls in hand, use the Nintendo DSi cameras or your Mii characters on Wii to fully customise your appearance in the game and take on opponents from all over the world! Whether you’re brand new to the game or a seasoned pro, there’s nothing like a classic card game to bring out the competitive spirit in everyone!

locale.title: World Poker Tour: Texas Hold 'Em
locale.synopsis: Play like the pros in WPT Texas Hold 'Em on Nintendo DSiWare, the official game tested and approved by the experts at the WPT! Whether you're just learning to play or you're an old-school player wanting to hook some fish, Texas Hold 'Em has tables for all players. Choose to play solo in two unique tournaments designed specifically for Nintendo DSiWare or use the DS Wireless Communication and play with your friends and take down monster pots. The action is in your hands in the most authentic poker game ever brought to the Nintendo DSi.
